mapper.select: SELECT tbuser.id ,tbuser.uid ,tbuser.nick ,tbuser.sfrom ,tbuser.name ,tbuser.process ,tbuser.phone ,tbuser.mpic ,tbuser.deleted ,tbuser.created_at ,tbuser.modified_at FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id = #{id}

SELECT tbuser.id ,tbuser.uid ,tbuser.nick ,tbuser.sfrom ,tbuser.name ,tbuser.process ,tbuser.phone ,tbuser.mpic ,tbuser.deleted ,tbuser.created_at ,tbuser.modified_at FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted}

SELECT tbuser.id ,tbuser.uid ,tbuser.nick ,tbuser.sfrom ,tbuser.name ,tbuser.process ,tbuser.phone ,tbuser.mpic ,tbuser.deleted ,tbuser.created_at ,tbuser.modified_at FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbuser.created_at ORDER BY tbuser.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbuser.id) as listsize FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted}
